messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Pushing people vs. relationships
messages.msgSnippet: I just realized that my relationship with my kids has taken on new meaning for me. I love 18-month-olds and 2-year-olds, and my youngest just turned 3. That
messages.messageBody:
I just realized that my relationship with my kids has taken on new
meaning for me. I love 18-month-olds and 2-year-olds, and my youngest
just turned 3. That means if I want to be around my grandkids at that
age, my kids have to want to be around me. Ack!

:-) Diane

>I think the thing to remember is number one, many people that are pushed have
>horrible relationships with their parents. If an Olympic Gold medalist was my
>priority, not a peaceful, happy relationship, then maybe that would be a good
>approach.
>
